amendment.description: To require a report on the Chemical and Biological Defense Program of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2018 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2018 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Romney to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4186) To require a report on the Chemical and Biological Defense Program of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2018 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Romney to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2018 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
